comment.author: 76204898@N00
comment._content: Apparently the Rhine Bridge between Strasbourg and Kehl, destroyed in 1940. The Wikipedia article on the current bridge has a photo of the destroyed bridge. (Actually the German Wikipedia article has better pictures which make identification easier.)

comment.author: 34904489@N07
comment._content:
trialsanderrors:

Thanks for the further identification of this bridge. (And you're right, the pictures on the German Wikipedia article are better for verification!)  We will add a bit more detail to this description when we update the record .

comment._content: Looks like it was built with materials left over from the cathedral...  :)
